article: the spokesman for bishops who claim leadership of a majority of the world 's anglican christians denounced the gay policies of america 's episcopal church on saturday , following a two-day caucus in atlanta with u.s. conservatives .
abstract: after u.s. visit africa 's top anglican leader denounces episcopal church on gays
